pages.title: Description
pages.text: Reapers are an ancient race that are able to inflict pain rather than damage. They bypass all armor and are §1able §1to drop a player to one §1heart. §cKill on site; or run!. $(br)Locations:§1 Jungle / Dark §1Forrest$(br)Variants:§1 N/A $(br)Weapon: §1Scythe$(br)Hostility:§1 Hostile; unless §1wearing the Reaper Armor$(br)Health:§1 15,000 $(br)Damage:§1 0.5 $(br)Tier:§1 3
